title: Ep. 429: Famed Bear Says Stocks Are Going Much Higher
itunes:title: Famed Bear Says Stocks Are Going Much Higher
description: Rich Suttmeier, CEO of Global Markets Research and 40-year market veteran, explains why investors should avoid fundamentals in the short-term - and buy stocks right now. He says the market will continue to be fueled by low interest rates, easy money policies and a global rush into high-dividend paying stocks.  Rich also shares his three favorite sectors likely to outperform the market over the next six months... A simple strategy any investor can use to buy safe dividend-paying stocks at dirt cheap prices... And his top individual stock picks that should be bought during earnings season.
